DOC.brief_summary: The goal study determine subjective gastrointestinal tolerance response difference breath hydrogen response follow consumption two type juice . This double-blind crossover study require participant arrive lab 12 hour fast , consume 12 oz juice complete gastrointestinal tolerance questionnaire well produce sample breath hydrogen analysis various time point next 3 hour . Subjects ask complete additional questionnaire 12 24 hour post consumption , home . Subjects also ask keep food record 24 hour prior schedule visit time assure compliance .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Juice Gastrointestinal Tolerance Breath Hydrogen Response Human Subjects
DOC.criteria: Between age 1865 Body mass index 1829 kg/m2 Demonstrates spoken write English literacy able provide write , informed consent review study protocol procedure • Use enema , laxatives , proton pump inhibitor , antibiotic within past 3 month Smoker Not regular breakfast eater Selfreported history past current gastrointestinal disease High fiber eater ( ≥3 serving high fiber food per day ) Concurrent recent ( within 30 day ) participation intervention trial Recent weight fluctuation Allergies test product
